summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3700 for the improvement of Mead Street, from Rainier Avenue to 48th Avenue South; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45517, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
